definitions: a barrier or manned entrance, typically at a border, where travelers are subject to security checks.
shortDefinitions: barrier or manned entrance where security checks are carried out on travellers

definitions: a place along the route of a long-distance race where the time for each competitor is recorded.
shortDefinitions: place on route in long-distance race where time for each competitor is recorded

definitions: a location whose exact position can be verified visually or electronically, used by pilots to aid navigation.
shortDefinitions: location whose exact position can be verified visually or electronically, used by pilots
